    • Method Detail

      • parseDateTime

        public static GregorianCalendar parseDateTime​(String dateTime,
                                              EnumSet<ISODateTime.DatePatterns> format)
                                       throws IOException
        Parse an ISO formatted dateTime string.

        Always: yyyy-mm-ddThh:mm:ss
        Optionally: a '.' followed by 1-9 digits holding fractions of a second
        Finally: 'Z' for UTC or an UTC time-zone difference expressed as +hh:mm or -hh:mm

        Parameters:
        dateTime - String to be parsed
        format - Permitted format
        Returns:
        GregorianCalendar
        Throws:
        IOException - If anything unexpected is found...

      • formatDateTime

        public static String formatDateTime​(GregorianCalendar dateTime,
                                    EnumSet<ISODateTime.DatePatterns> format)
        Create an ISO formatted dateTime string.

        Always: yyyy-mm-ddThh:mm:ss
        Optional: a '.' followed by 3 digits holding milliseconds
        UTC: Append 'Z'
        Local time: Append time-zone difference expressed as +hh:mm or -hh:mm

        Parameters:
        dateTime - The date/time object
        format - Format: Note Representation: true for UTC, false for local time
        Returns:
        String
